price: Nokorε sε, Yɛbɛyi asotwee no (kakra). Nokorε sε mobεsan akͻ (mo bͻne no) mu.
arabic: إِنَّا كَاشِفُواْ ٱلۡعَذَابِ قَلِيلًاۚ إِنَّكُمۡ عَآئِدُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: innā kāshifū al-ʿadhābi qalīlan innakum ʿāidūna
